_source.short_desc: Cloud-based backup as a service with incremental backups and continuous data encryption.
_source.long_desc: Cloud-based backup as a service with incremental backups and continuous data encryption.
_source.target_audience: Designed for businesses of all sizes, it is a cloud-based data backup solution that provides data encryption and saves it for extended periods.

category_features.name: Backup Log
category_features.definition: Records the events that occur during a backup process

category_features.name: Backup Scheduling
category_features.definition: Allows automatic backups (with all filtering, compressing, transferring to the storage, and other)

category_features.name: Cloud Backup
category_features.definition: Allows back up of files to cloud storage like Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox

category_features.name: Compression
category_features.definition: Reduction in the number of bits needed to represent data

category_features.name: Encryption
category_features.definition: Convert data into a code for security

category_features.name: Incremental Backup
category_features.definition: Copy only the new data that has been changed or created since the previous backup

related_products.short_desc: Cybersecurity application for IT administrators to prevent data breaches, covering a suite of devices, networks, and applications.
related_products.features: ESET Endpoint Security software is a cloud-based and on-premises application for internet security and malware protection. It has a global user base that comprises businesses of every size. Cloud sandbox technology enables users to protect their mobile devices, laptops, and desktops against ransomware, zero-day attacks, and data breaches. It features file, bot, and mail protection, along with remote device management, virtualization security, firewall set-up, and web control.

related_products.short_desc: IDrive protects all your PCs, Macs, mobile devices and servers into one cloud backup account.
related_products.features:
IDrive Backup is a versatile solution that allows users to backup an unlimited number of devices into one account, including PCs, Macs, mobile devices, and servers.

IDrive offers backup plans for consumers, small businesses, and enterprises of any size, giving users peace of mind that their data is protected and recoverable at all times.

related_products.short_desc: Endpoint data loss protection and security platform that enables small businesses to manage recovery of deleted files and more.
related_products.features: Endpoint data loss protection and security platform that enables small businesses and organizations to recover lost data caused through human error, ransomware or any other online disaster, where the recovered files can be tracked through status reports.

related_products.short_desc: The most reliable and easy-to-use backup for businesses of all sizes. Now with simplified licensing and active ransomware protection
related_products.features: Acronis Cyber Backup keeps costs low and productivity high. It ensures unlimited scalability, protects any workload, and leverages any storage and/or cloud. Balancing the value of data and infrastructure costs, its uniquely intuitive web-based management console makes it easy to monitor and schedule backups while built-in AI-based technologies prevents cryptomining attacks.

related_products.short_desc: Virtual Machine Backup and Replication for Hyper-V & VMware - Try it for free for 30 days. (Freeware available for micro-businesses.)
related_products.features: Altaro VM Backup is a virtual machine backup and replication solution for Hyper-V and VMware. Designed for IT departments, IT resellers and consultants, and Managed Service Providers (MSPs), it provides robust, streamlined, enterprise-level functionality, such as WAN-Optimized Replication, CDP, Augmented Inline Deduplication and more. It is characterized by ease of use, speed, affordability  and a Lightning Fast Support Call Response Guarantee of under 30 seconds. Try it for free for 30 days.

related_products.short_desc: Ninja Data Protection is a secure & reliable backup solution for all Windows endpoint giving you granular control over backup targets.
related_products.features: Ninja Data Protection is a secure, reliable, cloud-first backup solution for all Windows endpoints. Ninja backup allows file-only and full image backup, granular control over backup targets, schedules, and retention plans & more. Ninja's unified backup & endpoint platform enables  IT teams to proactively manage endpoints and protect critical business data from device failure or ransomware, providing peace of mind from day one.

related_products.short_desc: Powerful cross-platform backup and disaster recovery that leverages the public cloud to enable a comprehensive data protection strategy
related_products.features:
MSP360 Managed Backup. Simple. Reliable.

MSP360 Managed Backup is an easy-to-use backup solution with centralized management, monitoring, and reporting. The platform is natively integrated with AWS, Wasabi, Backblaze B2, and Microsoft Azure to enable best-in-class data protection for Windows, Linux, macOS, VMware, Hyper-V, Microsoft 365, and Google Workspace.

related_products.short_desc: With Virtual Machine Manager (VMM) you can set up and run various virtual machines, including Windows and Linux, on Synology NAS.
related_products.features: Virtual Machine Manager opens up abundant possibilities. You can set up and run various virtual machines, including Windows, Linux, and Ubuntu, on one Synology NAS. Easily allocate hardware resources such as computing power, storage space, or network interfaces among several virtual machines. Clone, restore, or create a failover of virtual machines within seconds, and rest assured that you can rollback any  failure at any time.

related_products.short_desc: Versatile backup solution designed for MSPs to offer managed backup service and earn recurring income.
related_products.features: Ahsay Cloud Backup Suite is specifically designed for Managed Service Providers, System Integrator's and IT Consulting Companies. It can empower you to offer secure managed, cloud based, and on-premises backup service to your business or end customers and earn recurring income. Supports database backup for;MS SQL, MS Exchange, Oracle, MySQL, and MariaDB. Virtual machine backup for VMware and Hyper-V, Synology and QNAP NAS devices, Android & iOS mobile devices, and Microsoft 365.

related_products.short_desc: 12,000 Customers backup with CloudAlly top-rated SaaS backup & recovery to protect all their business-critical Office 365 data on AWS
related_products.features:
Top Rated Pioneers of Cloud to Cloud Backup for Microsoft Office 365 - with 12,000 customers!

Protect your business-critical Office 365 data with CloudAllys enterprise-grade SaaS backup and point-in-time recovery for Microsoft 365 (Mail, Calendar, Contacts, and Tasks), SharePoint Online, OneDrive, and Groups/Teams. Our Office 365 SaaS backup is tailored for Office 365 administrators and security-focused IT professionals. 
CloudAlly is an OpenText Company

related_products.short_desc: Comprehensive enterprise backup solution for all workloads, combining data protection for backups, replicas, storage snapshots and CDP.
related_products.features:
Comprehensive enterprise backup solution for all workloads, combining data protection for backups, replicas, storage snapshots and CDP replicas under one control panel. 
Veeam provides backup, restore and replication for virtual machines and cloud-based workloads, as well as physical servers and workstations. VMware, Hyper-V, AWS, Azure, Windows, Linux, Nutanix AHV and Google GCP are supported. 
Veeam also delivers multiple integrations with leading storage vendors and service providers.

similar_products.short_desc: IDrive protects all your PCs, Macs, mobile devices and servers into one cloud backup account.
similar_products.features:
IDrive Backup is a versatile solution that allows users to backup an unlimited number of devices into one account, including PCs, Macs, mobile devices, and servers.

IDrive offers backup plans for consumers, small businesses, and enterprises of any size, giving users peace of mind that their data is protected and recoverable at all times.

similar_products.features: Ninja Data Protection is a secure, reliable, cloud-first backup solution for all Windows endpoints. Ninja backup allows file-only and full image backup, granular control over backup targets, schedules, and retention plans & more. Ninja's unified backup & endpoint platform enables  IT teams to proactively manage endpoints and protect critical business data from device failure or ransomware, providing peace of mind from day one.

similar_products.short_desc: Cove Data Protection offers backup, disaster recovery, and archiving. Protect servers, workstations, and Microsoft 365 with Cove.
similar_products.features: Cove Data Protection offers backup, disaster recovery, and archiving for the cloud-first world. Protect servers, workstations, and Microsoft 365 with efficient data protection as a service. Includes cloud storage and a unified multitenant dashboard. Save time, use less storage, and keep backups safer from ransomware with Cove.

similar_products.short_desc: 12,000 Customers backup with CloudAlly top-rated SaaS backup & recovery to protect all their business-critical Office 365 data on AWS
similar_products.features:
Top Rated Pioneers of Cloud to Cloud Backup for Microsoft Office 365 - with 12,000 customers!

Protect your business-critical Office 365 data with CloudAllys enterprise-grade SaaS backup and point-in-time recovery for Microsoft 365 (Mail, Calendar, Contacts, and Tasks), SharePoint Online, OneDrive, and Groups/Teams. Our Office 365 SaaS backup is tailored for Office 365 administrators and security-focused IT professionals. 
CloudAlly is an OpenText Company

similar_products.short_desc: If managing backups is just one of your countless responsibilities in IT, then consider Unitrends Backup for all-in-one ease-of-use.
similar_products.features: If managing backups is just one of your countless responsibilities in IT, then consider Unitrends for all-in-one ease-of-use. Unitrends Backup Software is a prepackaged virtual appliance with fully integrated backup, replication, deduplication, archive, and instant recovery. Run it on vSphere, Hyper-V, XenServer, or deploy it as a VM within the Azure or AWS cloud. Integrate with our cloud which is purpose-built for effortless, cost-efficient backup, offsite storage, long-term retention and DRaaS

similar_products.short_desc: Qumulo is the leading file data platform for data management and storage across multi-cloud environments.
similar_products.features:
Qumulo's disruptive file data platform is defining a new category in enterprise data management, providing its customers the most advanced solution available in the market for managing and accessing file data to create new services and applications. 

We built a unified file data platform to support the entire data lifecycle with powerful data services, right out of the box. Manage, store, and build with unstructured data at massive scale, anywhere you want.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful cross-platform backup and disaster recovery that leverages the public cloud to enable a comprehensive data protection strategy
similar_products.features:
MSP360 Managed Backup. Simple. Reliable.

MSP360 Managed Backup is an easy-to-use backup solution with centralized management, monitoring, and reporting. The platform is natively integrated with AWS, Wasabi, Backblaze B2, and Microsoft Azure to enable best-in-class data protection for Windows, Linux, macOS, VMware, Hyper-V, Microsoft 365, and Google Workspace.

similar_products.short_desc: Rubrik simplifies backup and recovery across hybrid cloud environments. Eliminate legacy complexity by consolidating disparate hardware
similar_products.features: Rubrik is a backup and recovery solution best suited for midsized to enterprise businesses (500+ employees). Rubrik delivers instant application availability to hybrid cloud enterprises for recovery, search, cloud, and development. By using the market-leading Cloud Data Management platform, customers mobilize applications, automate protection policies, recover from Ransomware, search and analyze application data at scale on one platform. From days to seconds.

similar_products.short_desc: Spanning solutions are trusted by over 10,000 organizations to provide data protection for Microsoft 365, G Suite, and Salesforce.
similar_products.features: Spanning's cloud-native, purpose-built solutions for Microsoft 365, G Suite, and Salesforce provide powerful capabilities to protect your organization's critical data from loss - unique in enabling end-users as well as administrators to quickly find and restore data in just a few clicks. With enterprise-class security and compliance, Spanning solutions meet the rigorous requirements for listing on Microsoft AppSource, Salesforce AppExchange and the G Suite Marketplace.

similar_products.short_desc: Start running backups and restores in less than 15 minutes! Comet is a fast, secure all-in-one backup platform for IT professionals.
similar_products.features:
Start running backups and restores in less than 15 minutes! Comet is a fast, secure all-in-one backup platform for businesses and IT providers. You control your backup environment and storage destination (local, AWS, Google Cloud Storage, Azure, Backblaze, Wasabi, or other S3 storage providers).

Our backup software supports businesses across 120 countries in 12 languages. Simple, profitable pricing. No contracts. Support, updates, replication, and re-branding are all free. 30-day FREE trial!

similar_products.short_desc: Axcient x360Recover is the most reliable, flexible and cost-effective business continuity and disaster recovery solution for MSPs.
similar_products.features: Axcient x360Recover is the most reliable, flexible and cost-effective business continuity and disaster recovery (BCDR) solution for MSPs and the SMBs they serve.  x360Recover protects data from cyberthreats with a solution that is simple to deploy and manage. Delivered as a flexible direct-to-cloud or appliance-based deployment, x360Recover covers nearly all BDR use cases-including appliance, server, and cloud-to-cloud-and is built on Axcient's proprietary Chain-Free backup technology.

similar_products.short_desc: Effortlessly backup and restore ExchangeOnline, OneDrive, SharePoint, and Teams  including all files, folders, and document libraries.
similar_products.features: Axcient x360Cloud protects and secures Microsoft 365 and Google Workspace data by providing complete backup and restore for Exchange Online, OneDrive, SharePoint, and Teams, plus Google Drive, including Google Docs, Files, and Folders. x360Cloud supports cloud-to-cloud backup directly from Microsoft 365 or Google Workspace to the Axcient Cloud, and is HIPAA, SOC-2, and GDPR compliant. x360Cloud allows MSPs avoid the risks of being 100% dependent on Microsoft or Google for business continuity.

similar_products.short_desc: A backup solution for your Active Directory, Office 365, and on-premises Exchange environments.
similar_products.features: RecoveryManager Plus is an integrated backup and recovery solution for your Exchange Online, on-premises Exchange, and Google Workspace mailboxes. Backup and restore all items in your mailboxes, including all attachments. Export entire Exchange Online and on-premises Exchange mailboxes or just a part of it as a PST file and secure them with a password for an additional layer of security.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Continuity software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Continuity tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Continuity software helps organizations to identify threats and plan for the prevention and recovery of information assets. These applications protect key organizational data in the event of a failure and in the wake of trouble, aid the rapid restoration of system function and data access. Typically Business Continuity solutions offer options for continuous or scheduled monitoring along with a variety of real-time data recovery tools. Backup storage can be maintained locally or routed to a remote server. Business Continuity software is related to Database Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Loss Prevention software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Loss Prevention tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Loss Prevention software keeps corporate sensitive data secure by identifying potential data breaches and helping to eliminate them.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Disk Imaging software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Disk Imaging tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Disk Imaging software assists organizations with creating copies, known as images, of data storage devices, such as optical disks, flash drives, SSDs, and hard drives to backup and restore disk data in cases of system failure, disk decommissioning, or forensic analysis.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top File Sharing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of File Sharing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: File Sharing software gives you the ability to quickly and securely share data across your company and with external partners. Sync your data across all your devices, access files and information from anywhere, and solve your data storage problems with file sharing software. Need more help? Visit the Collaboration software, Document Management software, Content Management software, and Portal software categories.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top File Sync software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of File Sync tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: File Sync software ensures that files stored in multiple locations or edited by multiple people contain the same information.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Server Backup software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Server Backup tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Server Backup software protects server data by duplicating it at regular intervals.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Virtual Machine software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Virtual Machine tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Virtual Machine software is used in place of corresponding hardware. Virtual Machines, or VMs, include virtual desktops, virtual servers, and virtual operating systems. Several different virtual operating systems can be installed on one physical computer.

pricing_plans.name: Backup for Azure VMs and on-premises servers
pricing_plans.description: Backup storage for LRS, ZRS, GRS, and RA-GRS are also available at an additional cost in Standard and Archive tier form. The pricing for Azure VMs and on-premises servers is according to various instances: an) 50 GB or less - $5 + storage consumed, b) 50-500 GB - $10 + storage consumed, c) Above 500 GB - $10/500 GB increment + storage consumed.

pricing_plans.name: Backup for SQL Server on Azure VMs
pricing_plans.description: The pricing for SQL Server on Azure VMs is according to the size of each instance: an) 500 GB or less - $30 + storage consumed, b) More than 500 GB - $30 for each 500 GB increment + storage consumed. The plan also offers backup storage options for LRS ($0.0224 per GB), ZRS ($0.028 per GB), GRS ($0.0448 per GB), and RA-GRS ($0.0569 per GB) at additional costs.

pricing_plans.name: Backup for SAP HANA on Azure VMs
pricing_plans.description: The pricing for SAP HANA on Azure VMs is according to the size of each instance: an) 500 GB or less - $98.94 + storage consumed, b) More than 500 GB - $98.94 for each 500 GB increment + storage consumed.. SAP HANA on Azure VMs comes with backup storage options for, ZRS ($0.028 per GB), LRS ($0.0224 per GB) , GRS ($0.0448 per GB), and RA-GRS ($0.0569 per GB) at additional costs.

pricing_plans.name: Backup for Azure Files
pricing_plans.description: Backup for Azure Files plan comes with videos, technical tutorials, and other resources. The Backup for Azure Files plan charges according to the size of each instance: an) Greater than 250 GB - $5, b) 250 GB or less - 60% of Azure Files Protected Instances/month.

pricing_plans.name: Back up for Azure Database for PostgreSQL
pricing_plans.description: Back up for Azure Database for PostgreSQL plan charges $7.50 (plus storage consumed) per 250 GB/instance. The plan also offers additional backup storage in standard and archive tier options: an) LRS - $0.0224 per GB and $0.0027 per GB, b) GRS - $0.0448 per GB and $0.0054 per GB, respectively.
